title: Bravo All-Stars Keep Us Company (Part 1)
itunes:title: Bravo All-Stars Keep Us Company (Part 1)
itunes:subtitle: In a very special two-part episode of Everything Iconic, Danny chats with an iconic lineup of Bravolebrities who all call in to help us all stay sane during our social distancing! He chats with Dorinda Medley from RHONY, Lisa Rinna from RHOBH, Monique ...
description:
In a very special two-part episode of Everything Iconic, Danny chats with an iconic lineup of Bravolebrities who all call in to help us all stay sane during our social distancing! He chats with Dorinda Medley from RHONY, Lisa Rinna from RHOBH, Monique Samuels from RHOP, Jackie Goldschneider from RHONJ, Braunwyn from RHOC, Kate Chastain from Below Deck, Patricia Altschul from Southern Charm, Ariana Madix and Scheana Shay from Vanderpump Rules, and maybe even a few more! So fire up the podcast app and stay inside/hang with us for some uplifting words, gossip, and laughs. Part 2 out next week.


Part 1 includes:

Dorinda RHONY: 5:38ish

Jackie RHONJ: 17:44ish

Lisa Rinna RHOBH: 31:38ish

Ariana PumpRules: 43:41ish

Monique RHOP: 1:00:06ish


For tickets to the Chicago live show: https://bit.ly/3bc6QLX

*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
